name: Free Podcast Cover Art Templates
description:
Customize our podcast artwork to create your own!


First impressions for podcasts are very important and the cover art of your podcast will determine whether someone listens or doesn't. 


We'll be updating this file and add new styles every few weeks.


âœ¨Edit the illustrations!

All the illustrations in this project were made with Blush, which means that you can customize them however you want using the Blush plugin!
